N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)

print(ans)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:54:26

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:41

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min, x_max = xs[0], xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:55:55

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x <= x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x >= x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:54:30

import sys

def solve(x, xs, n):
    xs = xs[:n]
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs, n))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

A.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(K, N):
    ans += A[i] - A[i - K]

# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:28

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:12

import sys

def solve(n, x, xs):
    return max(abs(x - xs[0]), abs(x - xs[-1]))

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys


def solve(xs, x):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max = x_max + (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min = x_min - (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min


def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
